name: Sems Game - Shepherd's Journey
description:
A small demo level, to prototype out a 'call' & 'command' an npc mechanic while also working on some level design (visual guidance & natural flow) and introducing and teaching a mechanic to a player.

Based on a concept of a friend; about a shepherd and their sheep.  Concept not final.

Assets:
- Sheep & Player model -  Low poly nature pack

- Free stylized skybox pack
